title.narrative: Livestock raising support and retail shop support

description.narrative: With limited livelihood skills, and with little or no land, livelihood training and support will be provided to support ex-Kamaiyas increase their income through productive employment, or by establishing small businesses.

activity-date.narrative: It was one time support, 220 families with livestock and 125 families with retail shop support have been supported within the amount of project although it was to support with 150 families livestock and 125 families retail shop

recipient-country.narrative: project working districts under saving credit groups that is formed by the project
